title: Wrong Status Code received
description: The open data portal responded with an unexpected response code. unable to process transaction

title: Unsupported Data Type
description: The data type specified in the request is not available. please check the data resolution

title: Unsupported Data Resolution
description: The specified data resolution is not supported by the open data portal

title: Station without data
description: The specified station has no data for the selected type and resolution. Please use another station.

title: Invalid timestamp in request
description: A timestamp supplied to the request could not be read as an integer. Please check your request
